entry.title: Cloud - Two Seater
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 2390.00 - 4520.00 (2 variants)

The ultimate sofa - 100% goose feather filled cushions encased in your choice of soft linen or supple cognac leather, and 3 separate modular pieces (corner, armless and ottoman) allowing endless configurations for your space. The Cloud offers unparalleled comfort and comes with a comprehensive lifetime warranty, due to its outstanding craftsmanship. *Scatter cushions included ONLY with FABRIC Cloud Modular not LEATHER.  

More colours available exclusively in store.

entry.title: Luna 3 Seater - Playful Optical
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Furniture Gallery
Type: Living
Price: 2599.00

Filled with goose feathers and featuring latex core reversible cushions for superb comfort, the Luna is the effortless sofa that's made to last (10 year seating warranty, 10 year frame warranty). Low maintenance and easy to keep clean, the slip covers are removable, waterproof and machine washable. The Luna is upholstered in a hardwearing, durable fabric that looks as luxurious as it feels.
